Cloak of Doom.name: Cloak of Doom
Cloak of Doom.flavor: A storm of disaster surrounds you, bringing doom to your foes.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, any enemy within 3 squares of you grants combat advantage to your allies, cannot teleport, and takes 5 damage whenever it misses with an attack.
Cloak of Doom.effect: Until the end of the encounter, any enemy within 3 squares of you grants combat advantage to your allies, cannot teleport, and takes 5 damage whenever it misses with an attack.
